overview: Zach has endured consistent troubles while sleeping ever since the crumbling of his family and home life alike. Within a matter of time, Zach believes he has met archetypal, nameless young woman, focused fully on helping him cope with all the troubles in the outside world as well as his own. As time goes on Zach loses sense of his reality, and he can no longer distinguish real life from dreams.
tagline: Love has taken a new form.
title: Sober During the Perfect Situation
